formattedAddress: 220 W Houston St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 220 W Houston St, New York, NY 10014-4846, USA

originalText.text: The meetings here saved my life. I counted days here, addressed my resentments, and try to give back whenever I can. They treat everybody with respect whether you're a millionaire or homeless.

text.text: The meetings here saved my life. I counted days here, addressed my resentments, and try to give back whenever I can. They treat everybody with respect whether you're a millionaire or homeless.

originalText.text:
I went for a meeting and shared about how scared I was that day when the cooper Hewitt Jewish students were stuck in the library because a riot of pro-Palestinians supporters were outside and how I felt unsafe now. I had a woman lash out at me and call me colonizer and say I support ethnic cleansing. I felt terribly attacked and in danger and brought it up with the leaders at the meeting and they said I got that because I brought politics to the meeting.

So I guess it‚Äôs a good meeting as long as you‚Äôre not Jewish. I will never go back
